quotes.t: Imagine my {qword}chagrin{/qword} when a whiz kid from Dayton made all A's in the first quarter while I made two B's and a C+.

In 1628, to the {qword}chagrin{/qword} of Governor William Bradford, the Pilgrims erected an 80-foot Maypole, danced around it, drank beer, and sang.
As many a woman has learned to her {qword}chagrin{/qword}, pathological liars are brilliant at deception.
